title: Amazon launch Christmas beauty advent calendar for 2019 and it looks incredible
text:

Beauty lovers are in for a treat as Amazon has become the latest retailer to unveil its beauty advent calendar for Christmas 2019.

Filled with a variety of beauty products - from skincare to makeup, this stunning countdown is really something special and will no doubt sell out fast.

The Amazon beauty advent calendar has an impressive worth of £220, but shoppers can buy it now from the Amazon website for a special price of £40.

For a limited time only, shoppers can save a tenner off the original £50 price - so it's best to get one now.

There are full and sample sizes included amongst the 24 goodies inside, which include popular brands like FOREO, L'Oreal Paris and Elemis.

Everything you need to look your best throughout the festive season is hidden behind the colourful pull-out drawers.

description: Expect skincare and makeup favourites from Foreo, Elemis and more in the new beauty festive countdown calendar from Amazon
